bio:
Since 2013 I am an Entrepreneur, I handle a couple of sites of my own. Moreover, I am officially Google certified in digital marketing, data analytics and mobile pages. Currently, I am the co-fFor the last 5.5 years, I have been serving as a Digital Marketing Executive for various big organizations and have been working on areas to improve the digital sales funnel of the business via search engine ranking and digital marketing strategies. Now, with the rising internet users across the world; peoples are engaging more online than offline due to which search ranking now plays a very good role for business organizations. Also, in near future search ranking will comprise almost 80% of the digital marketing sector. 

Due to these facts now I work as a search engine ranking specialist with expertise in technical s.e.o, s.e.o audit, on-page optimization, off-page optimization, link building, keyword analysis and research, competitor analysis and research and much more. I have proven track records of my works where I have helped 1st-page ranking including highly competitive keywords. I will be able to help you if you are planning to set ounder and C.T.O of ThatMedia, one of the largest growing social media and content marketing platform. 
I am very creative in nature and I do believe creativity is the first and the foremost thing which sets an individual apart. Right from my childhood I have had a keen interest over web and contents and so I started my dream to be worlds leading content marketer to drive traffic and engage users as best as can.
I am confident on my skills and I believe in results rather than words. Moreover, I have various certifications from Google & Facebook.  

One of the good talents which I have is that I can optimize any websites in the world to make it best performing within its field like on page factors, off page factors, a/b testing, monetization factors, seo auditing

Rest assured, my keyword analysis and research never fails. It always shows result.
Available 6 days a week for 14 hours each day. Mode of payment as per your convenience.

abstrac: Helping your business stand out through specialized interior design
bio:
We help restaurant, commercial and hospitality developers create unique and profitable brands through the fusion of specialized interior design and corporate branding.

We specialized in: commercial interiors, hospitality, restaurants and F&B development.

Run by Ian Dainton and Gabriela Peña, we pride ourselves in getting to know our clients, understanding their needs and creating unique designs for their businesses.

We are very flexible and can work depending on your needs. We are based in Mexico so our working hours are 9am-9pm EST but we have completed projects all over the world and can adjust to your local hour when necessary.

abstrac: I will write creative, academic, technical, and research-based writing
bio: I will write blog articles aimed at increasing your brand exposure as well as engaging your audience with thought leadership content that asserts your domain authority. I undertake painstaking research in order to completely understand your niche requirements and tailor my content to those unique needs. I have written for a wide range of subjects across the B2B and B2C spectrum, including healthcare, medical sciences, digital advertising, and financial management. I offer unlimited re-iterations, strong search engine optimization, content distribution activities, and extensive backlinking.

abstrac: Fast Solution Provider for Web Design/Development
bio:
I am Olha from Ukraine. I graduated from Ternopil Volodymyr Hnatiuk National Pedagogical University with a Bachelor's degree in web design and development.

With over 5 years of experience in freelance and agency environments, I care deeply about helping businesses tell their story through design. The work I deliver is 100% original and high quality.

If you are looking for a Custom Logo, Graphic, Web Design or a Full-stack Developer, you are at the right place.

My services also include
- Custom Logo Design
- Graphic Design (Marketing Collateral, Business Cards, Letterheads, etc)
- Custom Web Design and Development (React, SquareSpace, Wix, WordPress, Shopify)
- Social Media Management and Social Media Graphic Design

I have always ensured that the work I produce is in line with the client's requirements. As part of ensuring quality delivery, I prefer discussion over projects before taking them, ensuring that all key points and aims of the job are met.
Open to offers
